_comment: Created by ianb on 01/08/2014 12:43:50 using v2.1
title: Are GPs open at times that are convenient and are patients satisfied with this?
analysis_commentary:
The percentage of patients who said that the opening hours of their surgery were convenient for them was 75% in 2013/14 and 77% of patients were satisfied with their GP surgery opening hours.
Since 2011/12 there has been a decline in these results; patient satisfaction with GP surgery open hours is now at its lowest level since 2009/10.
